articles.title: Peter Strzok, F.B.I. Agent Who Criticized Trump in Texts, Is Fired
articles.description: Mr. Strzok was one of the F.B.I.’s top counterintelligence officials. But his disparaging texts about President Trump handed a weapon to conservatives assailing the Russia investigation.
